content.txt1: Iyi nzira ishobora gukora ibikorwa bisa n’ibikorwa vy’umuntu nyavyo harimwo, ariko bitagarukiye ku gukanda, ku maporogarama, n’ibindi kuri telefone yawe, kandi birashobora no gufungura ibisabwa vyo kwishura kugira ngo bishobore kwishura. Kubera ko hariho ingorane zo kwandikwa, gutanga amahera, n’ibindi, turagusavye cane ko ugishitsa gusa iyo utahura neza ibirimwo mu nyandiko.
content.txt2: Uko wofunga iki gikorwa: Ugurure urupapuro rw'inzu rw'iyi porogarama, ushobora guhagarika gukoresha igikorwa c'inyongera mu mirongo ya paji y'inzu, canke ushobora gukanda kuri buto ya "Fyonda ibikorwa vyose no gusohoka" kuri paji y'inzu. Iyi buto ihatira gufunga ibikorwa vyose biriko birashirwa mu ngiro no guhatira iyi app.
content.txt3: Impamvu dukoresha iyo nzira ni uko porogarama yacu ikeneye kugira ubushobozi bwo gufungura izindi porogarama no kuzigenzura, nk’igihe uriko urarondera instagram, ishobora guca inyegezwa inyuma y’aho iyo videwo imaze gukinwa, suzuma nimba igicuruzwa kiriko kiragurishwa, no kohereza ubutumwa ku ncuti zo kuri internet ubudasiba, n’ibindi, ivyo bikaba ari ibikorwa bishimishije canke bizigama abakozi.
content.title: Ibikorwa bibi
